materials.raw_text:
1. Silver (Ag) - 9.0 g 
 2. Mercury (Hg) - 3.0 g

sourcing.instructions:
1. Silver - Purchase from a reputable metal supplier or jewelry store. 
 2. Mercury - Obtain from chemical supply companies (ensure proper safety measures). 
 3. Silicon - Available at electronics or semiconductor suppliers. 
 4. Terbium - Available from rare earth metal suppliers or online chemical retailers.
